title: Learner-Centered E-Learning Courseware Design and Delivery Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Experience with Digital Learning Tools

learning_goals: Based on learner analysis, learners can apply an e-learning courseware design framework aligned with science education objectives

resources: Digital Authoring Tool for Science Education
